articles.description: Katy Perry reunited with her American Idol co-judge Luke Bryan in a surreal new ad for the upcoming Resorts World Las Vegas hotel/ Carrie Underwood and 'Queen Of Vegas' Celine Dion also starred.
articles.content:
Katy Perry reunited with her American Idol co-judge Luke Bryan in a surreal new ad for the upcoming Resorts World Las Vegas hotel.
Carrie Underwood and 'Queen Of Vegas' Celine Dion, 53, also starred… [+5957 chars]
